chart.description: The state of each upstream server based on % of HTTP 5xx status code responses. %5 is the critical threshold.
chart.name: Upstreams Critical Error Rate
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.upstreams.responses.5xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_name', 'upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.upstreams.responses.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_name', 'upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
E = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['upstream_name', 'upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='E', enable=False)
C = (A/(B)).scale(100).publish(label='C')

chart.description: The number of client requests per second, per server zone
chart.name: Requests / Second

chart.description: The number of dropped client connections
chart.name: Dropped Connections

chart.description: The state of each server zone based on % of HTTP 5xx status code responses. %5 is the critical threshold.
chart.name: Server Zones Critical Errors
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.server.zone.responses.5xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.server.zone.responses.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
F = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='F', enable=False)
C = (A/(F + B)).scale(100).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Accepted Connections

chart.name: Mean Upstream Server Response Time

chart.name: Bytes Received / Second

chart.name: Bytes Received / Second

chart.description: The % of responses sent with a HTTP 4xx status code from each server zone
chart.name: HTTP 4xx Status Code Response %

publishLabelOptions.displayName: count of server zones with 0 total responses
publishLabelOptions.label: D

chart.programText:
A = data('counter.server.zone.responses.4xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.server.zone.responses.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
D = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (A/(B+D)).scale(100).publish(label='E')

chart.description: The % of responses sent with a HTTP 5xx status code from each upstream group server
chart.name: HTTP 5xx Status Code Response %

publishLabelOptions.displayName: count of upstream peers with 0 total responses
publishLabelOptions.label: C

chart.programText:
A = data('counter.upstreams.responses.5xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.upstreams.responses.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (A/(B + C)).scale(100).publish(label='D')

chart.description: The top 10 hosts by % of SSL handshakes that have failed
chart.name: Host % Failed SSL Hankshakes

publishLabelOptions.displayName: C - Exclude x > 0 - Count by host
publishLabelOptions.label: F

chart.programText:
A = data('counter.ssl.handshakes.failed', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.ssl.handshakes.successful', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A + B).publish(label='C', enable=False)
F = (C).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['host']).publish(label='F', enable=False)
D = ((A/(C + F)) * 100).publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (D).top(count=10).publish(label='E')

chart.description: The number of accepted client connections per second
chart.name: Accepted Connections / Second

chart.description: The number of responses send for each HTTP status code across all server zones.
chart.name: Response HTTP Status Codes
chart.programText:
F = data('counter.server.zone.responses.1xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='F')
G = data('counter.server.zone.responses.2xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='G')
H = data('counter.server.zone.responses.3xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='H')
A = data('counter.server.zone.responses.4xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='A')
I = data('counter.server.zone.responses.5xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='I')

chart.description: The status of each server in each upstream group
chart.name: Upstream Server Status
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.upstreams.downtime', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_name', 'upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='A')
C = (A).above(0).count().publish(label='C', enable=False)

chart.description: The top 10 hosts by % of accepted client connections that were dropped
chart.name: Host % Client Connections Dropped
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.connections.dropped', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.connections.accepted', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A/B) * 100).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).top(count=10).publish(label='D')

chart.description: The top 10 caches by % of allocated disk used
chart.name: Cache Disk Usage
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.caches.size', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='max').sum(by=['cache_name', 'host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.caches.size.max', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='max').sum(by=['cache_name', 'host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A/B) * 100).publish(label='C', enable=False)
F = (C).top(count=10).publish(label='F')

chart.description: The number of NGINX Plus instances reporting metrics
chart.name: Instances Reporting

chart.description: The percentage of SSL handshakes that have failed. 5% is the critical threshold.
chart.name: SSL Handshake Failure %
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.ssl.handshakes.failed', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.ssl.handshakes.successful', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus'), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
D = (A).below(0, inclusive=True).count().publish(label='D', enable=False)
C = (A/(A + B + D)).scale(100).publish(label='C')

D = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['server_zone_name']).publish(label='D', enable=False)

chart.programText:
A = data('counter.upstreams.responses.4xx', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus') and filter('host', 'matt_mac'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.upstreams.responses.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'nginx-plus') and filter('host', 'matt_mac'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B).below(0, inclusive=True).count(by=['upstream_peer_name']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (A/(B + C)).scale(100).publish(label='D')
